responses: Vallurupalli Nageswara Rao Vignana Jyothi Institute of Engineering and Technology (VNRVJIET) is an engineering college in Hyderabad, India recognized by All India Council for Technical Education(AICTE) and affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad.

patterns: What are different clubs in VNRVJIET?
what are extra-circular activities in VNRVJIET?
responses: There are 9 clubs 1)STENTORIAN - ENGLISH LITERATURE CLUB 2) VIGNANA JYOTHI SAHITIVANAM - TELUGU LITERATURE CLUB ;3)VJ THEATRO ; 4) DRAMATRIX;5)SCINTILLATE -PHOTOGRAPHY;6)CREATIVE ARTS - ARTS CLUB; 7)LIVE WIRE- DANCE CLUB ; 8) NSS - SOCIAL SERVICE CLUB ; 9)CRESCENDO- MUSIC CLUB
There are total 9 extra circular activities clubs in VNRVJIET and many more co circular clubs.

patterns: which company provides highest package at VNRVJIET?
responses: Amazon SDE Offered about 28.75 Lakhs per annum package.
